sections.heading: educational institutions; tuition
sections.text: All state institutions are empowered to fix tuition and other fees to be paid by students residing in Nebraska.SourceLaws 1923, c. 57, § 2, p. 178;C.S.1929, § 85-502;R.S.1943, § 85-503.

85-503.State educational institutions; tuition.

All state institutions are empowered to fix tuition and other fees to be paid by students residing in Nebraska.

SourceLaws 1923, c. 57, § 2, p. 178;C.S.1929, § 85-502;R.S.1943, § 85-503.
